comments:
Internal error while updating tptp. Eclipse was installed as 3.2.1, is regularly updated, about reports version 3.2.2.
stack trace:
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FatalIOException: Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://mirror.pacific.net.au/eclipse/tptp/updates/plugins/org.eclipse.hyades.execution.win32.x86_4.3.1.v200611140100.jar.
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.UpdateManagerUtils.checkConnectionResult(UpdateManagerUtils.java:561)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.ContentReference.getInputSize(ContentReference.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:228)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.retrieveLocalJar(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:191)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getPluginEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:179)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:628)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:428)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:399)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$3.run(InstallWizard2.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
You should talk to the guys that own the mirror and ask about the missing file there. Obviously Update cannot do much when the required file is missing.

Same problem at the eclipse update site:
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FatalIOException: Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://eclipse.org/tptp/updates/plugins/org.eclipse.hyades.execution.win32.x86_4.3.1.v200611140100.jar.
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.UpdateManagerUtils.checkConnectionResult(UpdateManagerUtils.java:561)
    at org.eclipse.update.core.ContentReference.getInputSize(ContentReference.java:202)
    at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:228)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.retrieveLocalJar(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:191)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getPluginEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:179)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:628)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:428)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:399)
    at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$3.run(InstallWizard2.java:352)
    at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Again, you should transfer this defect to the TPTP inbox and ask them to post the missing bundle.
